entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 5:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 46 %
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: W 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets late in the evening then to rain showers near midnight. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
